response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance, I understand it might be a substantial investment for you. However, I believe it could also bring great benefits and opportunities to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer reflects my desire to see the product go to someone who appreciates its worth and can make the most out of it. I trust that this price is fair and presents a compelling proposition. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 1350000}
